rows.label: tev000211_MSG0010
rows.name:
Dear me! This is certainly some calamity that has
befallen us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0020
rows.name:
As a result, we are simply bursting with
curiosity! May we come with you, that we
may sate it somewhat? Pretty please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0050
rows.name:
Those are the very words we were
hoping to hear, and straight from the
babe's mouth! Let us go, then![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0080
rows.name:
Oh... It murders us, but if it must be so,
then so it must be. But we hope you will
reconsider at the next opportunity![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0090
rows.name:
The enemy's stronghold lies before us,
while dematerialization nips at our heels...
We are between a stone and a rock face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0100
rows.name:
And yet, one does not make an omelet without
cracking a few skulls, as the history books
teach us. We have faith in your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0110
rows.name:
Naturally, we will be with you every step
of the way. If this is to be the final battle,
we will follow you until the sour end![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0120
rows.name:
My, my... The world has certainly been
tipped on its side and vigorously shaken,
hasn't it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0130
rows.name:
Though we have been readying to
open our shop, it seems perhaps best
to focus our attentions elsewhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000211_MSG0140
rows.name: Please, take us with you! Pretty please![ST:wait ]
